title: Label Augmentation Method for Medical Landmark Detection in Hip Radiograph Images. (arXiv:2309.16066v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: This work reports the empirical performance of an automated medical landmark detection method for predict clinical markers in hip radiograph images. Notably, the detection method was trained using a label-only augmentation scheme; our results indicate that this form of augmentation outperforms traditional data augmentation and produces highly sample efficient estimators. We train a generic U-Net-based architecture under a curriculum consisting of two phases: initially relaxing the landmarking task by enlarging the label points to regions, then gradually eroding these label regions back to the base task. We measure the benefits of this approach on six datasets of radiographs with gold-standard expert annotations.

translated_title: 医学髋关节X射线图像中的标记点检测的标签增强方法
translated_abstract: 本文报道了一种用于预测髋关节X射线图像中临床标记点的自动化医学标记点检测方法的实证性能。值得注意的是，该检测方法是使用仅标签增强方案进行训练的；我们的结果表明，这种增强形式优于传统的数据增强，并且产生高效的样本估计器。我们使用基于通用U-Net架构的课程训练，该训练包括两个阶段：首先通过将标记点扩大到区域来放松标记任务，然后逐渐将这些标签区域回归到基本任务。我们在含有黄金标准专家注释的六个放射图像数据集上评估了这种方法的优势。
tldr: 该论文提出了一种适用于医学髋关节X射线图像中的标记点检测任务的标签增强方法。通过使用仅标签增强方案进行训练，该方法超越了传统的数据增强方法，在样本利用效率上表现出色，可提高标记点检测的准确性。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a label augmentation method for medical landmark detection in hip radiograph images. By training with label-only augmentation, the method outperforms traditional data augmentation and produces highly sample efficient estimators, improving the accuracy of landmark detection.
